mapper.select: select d.id, o.withdrawal_order_no as platformOrderNo, d.withdrawal_id as systemOrderNo, d.amount/100 as orderMoney from tf_loan_withdrawal_order d where FROM_UNIXTIME(d.update_time)=#{date} and d.status='succeeded'
select count(1) from tf_loan_withdrawal_order d where FROM_UNIXTIME(d.update_time)=#{date} and d.status='succeeded'
